top_comments.comment: The building like like a fire trap.

We were just a hair's breadth away from the Jan.6th coup succeeding. I understand there were buses sent to evacuate the Representatives poised to certify the election. Fortunately the representatives did not evacuate and the certification was concluded a bit late.
